reviewText: This was purchased to replace a VHS version that I already have ! ! !  I really do like these movies ! ! !

this movie has everything an animal lover would love.  Small kids can enjoy an adventure while watching an animal hero save the day and win his rewards. The only "bad" scene is where the bad guy kicks Tiffany but they don't show it either.  Too bad this style isn't adopted over the more graphic films for kids.  The kids show good manners and more or less everyone models good behavior. All in all a great family film. Bonus on the other movies, i didn't watch them but the kids seem to like them. win-win for everyone.

This was a gift to my friend. She was remembering good times as a child and how she wished to see them again. I was so happy to make her happy with this purchase. It was a great addition to her collection. Thanks!

Bought this for my four year old Grandaughter.  She loves it we watch it all the time.
I would highly recommend this movie for children.  Not an action filled plot by today's
standards but very well done and kid friendly. And Benji does get the girl in the end.
Long time ago.  However, it was a gift so don't know how it has played.  Didn't have the exact episodes for which I had hoped, tho'.

If they gave Academy Awards for K-9 performances, Benji would certainly have received several awards; in fact, they should name the award "The Benji!"  I received this DVD on time and in excellent condition.  Thank you.  JG
exactly what i was looking for
I bought this for my six year old grand daughter who loved it.  Brings back my own childhood memories.  Benji is just as lovable today as he was when I was little.
